We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue. If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end. Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products. Ticket Number: 00430098 Ticket Subject: Vulnerability Identified in Apache Struts CVE-2024-53677 Ticket Details: Internal vulnerability team has identified a recently discovered vulnerability in Apache Struts is affecting our Stealthbits/Enterprise Auditor installation. The CVE mentions there is a newer version of the package that resolves it, but as it was part of the software installation I am not sure how to resolve this. Is Netwrix aware and/or working on a hotfix? C:Program Files (x86)STEALTHbitsStealthAUDITActionsSurveyWebServletWEB-INFlibstruts2-core-6.3.0.2.jar Reference Links: https://securityonline.info/cve-2024-53677-critical-vulnerability-in-apache-struts-allows-remote-code-execution https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-53677 https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/WW/S2-067 Thank you!
